description: Pre-commit hooks blocking commits due to 78+ ESLint errors. Root cause: base no-unused-vars rule conflicting with TypeScript version.
ESLint reporting no-unused-vars errors for underscore-prefixed parameters (_param). Base ESLint rule doesn't respect argsIgnorePattern configured in @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars.
Disabled base no-unused-vars rule in shared ESLint config
Removed unnecessary eslint-disable comment from PriorityCalculator.ts
Removed unnecessary eslint-disable block from SportsService.ts

items: Pre-commit hooks should now pass for graphql-server changes
Frontend has 23 errors, 20 warnings (separate issues: unused vars in Svelte, missing each keys, any types)

content: When using TypeScript with ESLint, must disable base no-unused-vars and use @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars with argsIgnorePattern: ^_ for underscore convention.
Project uses ESLint 9.x flat config. shared/eslint.config.base.js defines base rules, imported by graphql-server and frontend configs.
